pageProduct.name: SUP Immune Cold & Flu 65 Gummies
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Elderberry, Echinacea & Zinc for daily immune defence against the symptoms of the cold, flu and ah-choos.

KICK THE SICK

In today's hustle and bustle, we know you can't afford to get sick. That's why we developed SUP Immune Cold & Flu Defence to help you combat the symptoms of the common cold and flu. SUP has formulated these delicious and easy to eat gummies, jam-packed with the nutrients your immune system needs so that it can do what it was made for - to keep you going and going and going. 

 

WHY CHEW SUP?

Chew your supplements with SUP's delish gummies. SUP Immune Cold & Flu Defence is formulated with immune supporting heroes, like Elderberry and Echinacea, traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine, to help:

  • Fight cold and flu symptoms
  • Support immune system health
  • Relieve the severity of symptoms of common colds and flu
  • Maintain your overall immune system function
CHEWSUP

Size: 65 Pastilles

KEY FEATURES

• Traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to reduce cold and flu symptoms
• Support immune system health
• Traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to relieve the severity of symptoms of common colds and flu
• Maintain your overall immune system function
• 99% Sugar Free

Warnings

The recommended daily amount of Vitamin A from all sources is 700 micgrograms retinol equivalents for women an 900 micrograms retinaol equivalents for men. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Vitamin and mineral supplements should not replace a balaned diet. Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken or missing. Reseal immediately after use.

Ingredients

Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 45mg
Zinc (as zinc citrate dihydrate) 3mg
Retinol palmitate (Vitamin A) 276mcg
Equiv. to (Vitamin A 500 IU) 150.7mcg RE
Colecalciferol (Vitamin D3 250 IU) 6.25mcg
dl-alpha-tocopheryl acetate (Vitamin E15 IU) 15mg
Echinacea purpurea leaf juice powder 48.75mg
Equiv. Echinacea purpurea juice fresh 1.95g
Sambucus nigra (Elderberry) fruit juice powder 45mg
Equiv. Sambucus nigra juice fresh 1.575g

Contains: CONTIANS SUCRALOSE AND SULFITES

Allergen Contains: Sulphites

Allergen Free From: Gluten

Directions

WARNING: If you are pregnant - or considering becoming pregnant - do not take Vitamin A supplements without consulting your doctor. When taken in excess of 3000 micrograms retinol equivalents - Vitamin A can cause birth defects.

For general immune support take 2 gummies daily.

At the first sign of common cold symptoms take 2 gummies 2 times a day. Or take as directed by your health professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25oC
